summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 5.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 225 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1808 m), feels like temperature (up 2.8°C), outside temperature (up 2.8°C), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 225.0m lower than yesterday, 753.7m lower than the past week, 1807.7m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 713m to 1594m and averaged 842.0m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, air moisture should feel ok and calm and still conditions are expected. Rain showers likely, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and it’s dim outside. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
